About Me

I am Madhari Chandana, a dedicated software engineer passionate about crafting innovative solutions to complex problems. With a blend of technical expertise and creativity, I thrive in the dynamic world of software development, where every line of code holds the potential to make a meaningful impact. I graduated with a B.Tech degree in Civil Engineering from IIT Gandhi Nagar. I have a passion for coding and proficient in languages.

Eductional Details

B.Tech: Indian Institute Of Technology Gandhinagar

Class XII: Telangana Social Welfare Residential Educational Institution

Class X: Telangana Social Welfare Residential Educational Institution

Skills

Python, C++, Java, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

Tools

Autodesk Inventor Professional, ANSYS, LTspice, QGIS, SAP Analysis, and Google Earth Pro

Projects

Development of a Smart Dustbin

Collaborated with a team to conceptualize, design, and develop a smart dustbin prototype aimed at optimizing waste management processes. Leveraged knowledge of sensor technology to integrate sensors and microcontrollers into the smart dustbin, enabling automated waste detection and sorting functionalities.

Personal Portfolio Website

Created a professional portfolio website to showcase personal projects,skills, and experiences. Designed and implemented a custom website to showcase both technical and creative skills.

3D CAD Modeling

Spearheaded the creation of a comprehensive 3D computer-aided design (CAD) model for a steam engine, utilizing software such as SolidWorks or AutoCAD. We generated realistic visualizations and renderings of the 3D CAD model to visualize and analyze the steam engine's performance.
